line.style: fill: #010101; stroke: #010101; stroke-linecap: square; stroke-miterlimit: 10; stroke-width: 4px;

path.style: fill: none; stroke: #010101; stroke-linecap: square; stroke-miterlimit: 10; stroke-width: 4px;

circle.style: fill: none; stroke: #010101; stroke-linecap: square; stroke-miterlimit: 10; stroke-width: 4px;

line.style: fill: none; stroke: #010101; stroke-linecap: square; stroke-miterlimit: 10; stroke-width: 4px;
